pr_title: Supply matrixstack to IRenderHandler where possible. Closes #6439

timeline.bodyText:
This breaks the @FunctionalInterface on certian compilers IIRC. As it only works with one method.
Why remove the MC argument? I understand you can get it from Minecraft.getInstane, but having it passed in seems like better practice.
timeline.author: LexManos

replies.bodyText: It won't, plenty of stdlib functional interfaces have lots of default methods. Just look at Comparator.
replies.author: tterrag1098

timeline.bodyText: Why not just do that now and make this class as deprecated, and have the children extend it?
timeline.author: LexManos
